page.title: 13PIG FARM
page.content: The{pig farm}is situated on Thorpe Lane.It is out of the the way as it is at the back of a row of houses and down a long driveway.There is a sign on the gate that reads "KEEP OUT" because of disease precautions and also another sign, Cotswold minimal disease from pigs representitives by appointment only.There are lots of outbuildings at the end of the driveway and they have long wide silver containers which contain food for the pigs.This kind of farm is the only pig farm in Thorpe on the hill.
